title: When Youâ€™re Gone
lyrics:
[intro] (Dm) (F)  (C)  (G)
 
I've been (Dm)wandering around the (G)house all night, (C)wondering what the hell to do
Yeah, I'm (Dm)trying to concentrate, but (G)all I can think of is (C)you
Well, the (Dm)phone don't ring 'cuz my (G)friends ain't home, I'm (C)tired of being all alone
Got the (Dm)TV on 'cuz the (F)radio's playing (G)songs that remind me of you
 
[chorus]
Baby when you're (Dm)gone, (F) I realize I'm in (C)love (G)
Days go on and (Dm)on, (F) and the night seem (C)so-o-o (G)long
Even food don't taste that (Dm)good, (F) drink ain't doing what it (C)should (G)
Things feel so (Dm)wrong, (Bb) baby when you're (G)gone
 
I've been (Dm)driving up and (G)down these streets, (C)tryin' to find somewhere to go
Yeah, I'm (Dm)looking for a familiar (G)face, but there's no one I (C)know
Oh, (Dm)this is torture, (G)this is pain, (C)feels like I'm gonna go insane
I (Dm)hope you're coming (F)back real soon, 'cuz I (G)don't know what to do
 
[chorus]
Baby when you're (Dm)gone, (F) I realize I'm in (C)love (G)
Days go on and (Dm)on, (F) and the night seem (C)so-o-o (G)long
Even food don't taste that (Dm)good, (F) drink ain't doing what it (C)should (G)
Things feel so (Dm)wrong, (Bb) baby when you're (G)gone
 
[kazoo solo!]
(Dm)  (F)  (C)  (C) x3
(Dm)  (Bb)  (G)  (G)
 
[chorus]
Baby when you're (Dm)gone, (F) I realize I'm in (C)love (G)
Days go on and (Dm)on, (F) and the night seem (C)so-o-o (G)long
Even food don't taste that (Dm)good, (F) drink ain't doing what it (C)should (G)
Things feel so (Dm)wrong, (Bb) baby when you're (G)gone
Baby when you're (Dm)gone, (Bb) baby when you're (F)gone [end]
